On level 8 collect all the coins apart from a 4x4 square in both the top right and botton left corners.
On level 11 collect all the coins apart from a 4x4 square in the centre.
On level 17 collect all the coins apart from a 1 coin thick edge surrounding the screen.
On level 23 collect all the coins apart from a 3x3 square in each corner.
On level 28 collect only the coins in the bottom half of the screen.
On level 30 collect only a strip of 2 coins up the centre.
On level 26 activate four drones at once.
On level 25 break 15 consecutive laser gates.
On level 24 leave 5 consecutive walls unbroken.
On level 16 headbutt the underside of 6 consecutive platforms.
On level 22 get the three drones to collide at once.
